text: Kehi manisaharu yasta pani chan, jasale allahako saktima arula'i sajhedara bana'era tinala'i allaha jastai mayam gardachan, ra asthavanaharu allahasangako premama atyanta kathora hunchan. Kati ramro hunthyo yadi an'yayiharule allahabata hune sajaya dekhera yo janeko bha'e ki sabai prakarako sakti allahama nai nihita cha ra yo pani ki allaha kathora sajaya dinevala cha (ta kadapi kasaila'i sajhedara bana'une thi'enan)
